comment: Smart Data Models - ExcAC6A adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcAC6A/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modified IEEE AC6A alternator-supplied rectifier excitation system with speed input.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: ka
contents.comment: Voltage regulator gain (Ka).  Typical Value = 536. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kc
contents.comment: Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (Kc).  Typical Value = 0.173. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kd
contents.comment: Demagnetizing factor, a function of exciter alternator reactances (Kd).  Typical Value = 1.91. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ke
contents.comment: Exciter constant related to self-excited field (Ke).  Typical Value = 1.6. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kh
contents.comment: Exciter field current limiter gain (Kh).  Typical Value = 92. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ks
contents.comment: Coefficient to allow different usage of the model-speed coefficient (Ks).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: seve1
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Ve1, back of commutating reactance (Se[Ve1]).  Typical Value = 0.214. Default: 0.0

contents.name: seve2
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Ve2, back of commutating reactance (Se[Ve2]).  Typical Value = 0.044. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (Ta).  Typical Value = 0.086. Default: 0

contents.name: tb
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (Tb).  Typical Value = 9. Default: 0

contents.name: tc
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (Tc).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

contents.name: te
contents.comment: Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (Te).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: th
contents.comment: Exciter field current limiter time constant (Th).  Typical Value = 0.08. Default: 0

contents.name: tj
contents.comment: Exciter field current limiter time constant (Tj).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

contents.name: tk
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (Tk).  Typical Value = 0.18. Default: 0

contents.name: vamax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (Vamax).  Typical Value = 75. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vamin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (Vamin).  Typical Value = -75. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ve1
contents.comment: Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (Ve).  Typical Value = 7.4. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ve2
contents.comment: Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (Ve2).  Typical Value = 5.55. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vfelim
contents.comment: Exciter field current limit reference (Vfelim).  Typical Value = 19. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vhmax
contents.comment: Maximum field current limiter signal reference (Vhmax).  Typical Value = 75. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 44. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (Vrmin).  Typical Value = -36. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
